channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science and Technology, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science and Technology, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On the Necessity of Collaboration for Online Model Selection with Decentralized Data
item.description: Federated online model selection needs collaboration only when clients have limited computing power; otherwise, independent learning suffices.
